definitions.definition: ( informal ) A child (usually) or young adult .
examples: She's a kid . It's normal for her to have imaginary friends.

subdefinitions.definition: ( informal ) A person whose childhood took place in a particular time period or area.
examples: Only '90s kids will remember this toy.
He's been living in Los Angeles for years now, but he's a Florida kid .

subdefinitions.definition: ( informal ) One's son or daughter, regardless of age.
examples: This is Bobby, he is our youngest kid .

subdefinitions.definition: ( in the vocative ) Used as a form of address for a child, teenager or young adult.
( colloquial ) An inexperienced person or one in a junior position.

examples: He treated the oxen like they didn't exist, but he treated the goat kid like a puppy.

subdefinitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The meat of a young goat.

definitions.definition: ( dated ) A deception ; an act of kidding somebody.
( nautical ) A small wooden mess tub in which sailors received their food.

main_definition: ( informal ) A child (usually) or young adult .
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) A deception ; an act of kidding somebody.
( nautical ) A small wooden mess tub in which sailors received their food.

definitions.definition: Synonym of faggot ( “ bundle of heath and furze ” ) .

main_definition: Synonym of faggot ( “ bundle of heath and furze ” ) .
